mapper.select:
SELECT sys_id, order_no, reference_no, order_cates, user_id, cellphone_no, order_time, total_qty, status, remark, parent_no, user_channel, is_deleted, creationtime FROM order_main
AND user_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{params.userId}, '%')

SELECT sum(om.status = 0) sum1 ,sum(om.status = 1) sum2 ,sum(om.status = 2) sum3 ,sum(om.status = 3) sum4 FROM order_main om WHERE 1 = 1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.user_id = #{params.userId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, oee.exam_master_item examMasterItem, om.status, ub.full_name customerName, ub.id_card_no idNo, ub.gender, om.cellphone_no cellphoneNo1, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, om.amount, oa.address FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = om.user_id WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.sys_id sysId, om.order_no orderNo, om.status, ub.full_name customerName, ub.id_card_no idNo, ub.gender, om.cellphone_no cellphoneNo1, uc.card_cates cardCates, uc.card_no cardNo, si.name siName, oa.time_from timeFrom, oa.time_to timeTo, om.order_time orderTime, om.user_channel userChannel, om.amount, sd.department_name departmentName, oai.option_2, oa.address FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa ON oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id LEFT JOIN user_cards uc ON om.user_id = uc.user_id LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = om.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_department sd ON sd.sys_id = oa.department_id LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai ON oai.order_no = om.order_no WHERE 1=1 AND om.is_deleted = 0
AND om.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT
FROM order_main WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} LIMIT 1

select order_no from order_main where status = 2
AND reference_no = #{params.referenceNo}
SELECT od.rest_count FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN order_detail od on om.order_no = od.order_no WHERE om.user_id = #{params.userId} and od.append_id = 2 and od.rest_count is not NULL
SELECT epa.append_id -- 套餐下的服务 FROM order_main as om LEFT JOIN exam_package_append as epa ON om.reference_no=epa.package_main_id where order_no=#{orderNo}

SELECT oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.institution_id, oa.related_no, oa.order_no, oai.option_1, oa.time_from, oa.`status` appointment_status, om.order_cates, om.reference_no, om.`status` pay_status, om.user_id, oa.entity_id, epm.package_name FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_main om on oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on epm.sys_id = om.reference_no WHERE oa.appointment_cates = 3 and oa.user_id = #{params.userId} and om.reference_no = #{params.referenceNo} and oa.is_cancelled = 0 and om.is_deleted = 0

SELECT oa.appoint_date, em.`name` itemName, ed.item_name itemDetailName, oa.order_no, oa.time_from, si.`name` institutionName, oa.is_cancelled FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_extension_exam oee ON oee.sys_id = oa.extensionItem_id LEFT JOIN exam_master em ON em.sys_id = oee.exam_master_id LEFT JOIN exam_detail ed ON ed.sys_id = oee.exam_detail_id LEFT JOIN sys_institution si ON si.institution_id = oa.institution_id WHERE oa.parent_no = #{params.orderNo}

SELECT oa.address, oa.appointment_cates, oa.appoint_date, oa.department_id, oa.entity_id, oa.institution_id, oa.order_no, oa.related_no, oa.service_option, oai.option_1, oa.time_from, oa.user_id, om.order_cates, om.parent_no, om.reference_no, oa.`status` appointment_status, om.`status` pay_status, epm.package_name FROM order_appointment oa LEFT JOIN order_main om on oa.order_no = om.order_no LEFT JOIN order_additional_info oai on oai.order_no = oa.order_no LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on epm.sys_id = om.reference_no where om.parent_no = #{params.parentNo} and (oa.appointment_cates = 2 or oa.appointment_cates = 4) and om.is_deleted = 0 and oa.is_cancelled = 0

SELECT epm.package_name, om.order_no, oa.creation_time, om.reference_no, om.hr_oppointment_id, om.order_cates FROM order_main om LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on epm.sys_id = om.reference_no LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa on om.order_no = oa.order_no WHERE (om.order_cates = 3 or om.order_cates = 1) and om.user_id = #{params.userId} and om.is_deleted = 0 GROUP BY order_no ORDER BY oa.creation_time DESC
